website_summaries.verdict: Pearl extract and other natural ingredients reduce dark spots and dullness, and help restore a youthful glow to aging skin. Brightens and hydrates your complexion. Box of 10 masks.
pros: The mask sheet is made of downy cotton, so is very soft against your skin
Pearl extract is loaded with amino acids and minerals that nourish the skin and fade dark spots, while moisturizing hyaluronic acid and ceramides relieve dryness and dullness
cons: A few users complained the mask left their skin feeling a bit sticky

customer_reviews.title: OK for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I have super sensitive acne prone skin and these faded a lot of my discoloration. I did only use this once a week in fear of my sensitive skin freaking out. They have since changed the packaging and hopefully that is the only thing that has changed.
customer_reviews.author: user1987

customer_reviews.title: Very Soothing and Moisturizing! - I’m Sold
customer_reviews.text: I use many Korean sheet mask brands since I’m interested in K-beauty. Many other masks are sometimes too rich or too reactive to my hyper sensitive skin. But this sheet mask I really like. I have ordered two different sheet masks from Mothermade and both are super calming and moisturising. Calm enough to use as leave-on mask throuhout the night! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Fit
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. The mask fits very odd... I agree with others that it's unbearably sticky even after waiting ample time for it to absorb. By the time I am able to unfold it, spend the time adjusting (I literally thought I somehow put it on upside down because I didn't use a mirror) I couldn't care less if the results were good. They definitely need to reshape
customer_reviews.author: Jackie B.Top Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: My face is soooo smooth
customer_reviews.text: I love these. It makes my face feel super smooth and moisturized for days. I do feel like the holes don't match up on my face very well so I do have to be careful not to get it in my eyes. Seriously I'm so glad I got a pack of 10. I keep giving them to friends to try too.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Eh.
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this if you have sensitive skin. Seven minutes after wearing this, my face started to burn, not much, but it was really annoying. I took it off and noticed that the areas that were covered by the mask were really red. The area around my eyes looked yellow compared to the rest of my face. It also fit weird and was pretty sticky after peeling it off. It arrived nice, so that's good.
customer_reviews.author: Almighty Loaf

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand and their other masks are just as good!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley L

customer_reviews.title: Tacky/sticky
customer_reviews.text: Good sized mask. Mask is pretty saturated with serum. Scent is powdery. Mask gave me a nice glow but did not even out my skin tone or lighten of my acne scars. But what i did not like about this product is that after removing the mask the serum is very tacky. My face and neck was very sticky. Its like if l looked down and my chin touches my neck they'd be glued together. You may wash your face/neck after but I think that would defeat the purpose. Will not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: dianne_rn

customer_reviews.title: Good sheet mask
customer_reviews.text: This leaves my face glows and dewy. Definitely brightens. What I will say is that after a while it would burn my face a little so sensitive skin beware!
customer_reviews.author: Tianna Burns

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: This makes my face feel good. As in the review of the Bird's Nest Mask, only time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: cathyc

customer_reviews.title: Made my skin so bright and hydrated!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these. Made my skin so bright and hydrated. Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Holt

customer_reviews.title: After using it, my face still felt really sticky ...
customer_reviews.text: After using it, my face still felt really sticky. After getting rid of the excess serum, my goodness my face was soft.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Does seem to brighten completion!
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for a good sheet mask for the past couple of months. Came across this one and decided to give it a try because of the reviews. It is a great mask. It does help brighten the skin and has enough serum in there to last a good 30-40 minutes, before it starts to dry out. I detracted one start because of the fit of the mask (I have had better fitting masks) and because it leaves behind a bit of a "sticky" feel from the serum. Still overall a good mask that delivers what it promises.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly C

customer_reviews.title: Will not buy again
customer_reviews.text: Thie mask feels like slime when you pu it on. My skin is probably moisturized, but my skin is sticky and gummy. I now want to wash my face again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I just love these! There is so much to be said ...
customer_reviews.text: I just love these! There is so much to be said about hydrating your face!!!
customer_reviews.author: Greatnicks

customer_reviews.title: Awesome results with these sheet masks!
customer_reviews.text: Love these masks! Will definitely purchase again in the future! I have sensitive skin, and these are so calming. Could see a difference in the clarity of my skin after one use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They were good, so I reordered them
customer_reviews.text: This was the 2nd time I ordered these masks. There were 10 pieces in a box in one order. I gave 5 pieces to a relative to try it. I used the rest. They were good, so I reordered them. The 2nd order was a great disappointment. After I opened the shipping package, the box inside that held the 10 pieces of masks looked old, ripped and opened. The mask itself was very watery and it did not fit well on the face especially the areas around the nose and lips. I would not order mask from this brand anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Mary LL

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre
customer_reviews.text: I've become a sheet mask fanatic lately and have been trying all kinds of different brands and features. This one is really nothing special :( Skin is sticky after mask removal and there is no real radiance or wonderful effect on the face Compared with other masks where you see an immediate change and healthy looking skin directly after application I expected more based on the ratings. But i honestly wouldn't suggest this one for any particular reason. It's really just blah
customer_reviews.author: zGirlinGreen

customer_reviews.title: GOOD FOR TIRED SKIN!
customer_reviews.text: This face mask is pretty good! Yes, there are some sticky feelings after, but that didn't bother me much. I shared it with my mom, who's in the 60s, and SHE LOVES IT! She told me it feels refreshed and brightened afterward. Store them in the refrigerator and use it after a long day! I feel revitalized and rejuvenated after!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Y.

customer_reviews.title: Moisture is awesome
customer_reviews.text: Uncertain if this is brightening my face, but the moisture alone is awesome. It's a bit slimy at first, but after you take the mask off and it dries, my face feels so soft and moist.
customer_reviews.author: L. Pavlov

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Mask was dripping with serum. I left it in my face for an hour and mask was still moist. Left my face moisturized through the night. I did need to use my night cream or sleeping pack. Will have to see if my face gets brighter after I use all 10.
customer_reviews.author: Aekkim

customer_reviews.title: Luxurious Facial Mask
customer_reviews.text: Love these face masks. I used them at night to relax before sleep, and feel that I wake up more moisturized. There is more than enough of the product to use on my neck and décolleté.
customer_reviews.author: IrisDaughter

customer_reviews.title: i didn't like the after feeling when you take off the mask
customer_reviews.text: i think that it is ok. i didn't like the after feeling when you take off the mask. the solution was too sticky for my comfort, i had to wash it off everytime cause i could n't stand it.
customer_reviews.author: Mstar

customer_reviews.title: I will definitely be ordering more and have even recommended this to my Aunt who also loves them and ...
customer_reviews.text: You can most definitely see the difference after using this mask. I will definitely be ordering more and have even recommended this to my Aunt who also loves them and is buying some for herself!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Instructions in English!!
customer_reviews.text: I would like to have instructions on how to use product. Nothing is in English
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Drozd

customer_reviews.title: prefer other brands like Beauty Diary or
customer_reviews.text: Ok for my skin...prefer other brands like Beauty Diary or Innisfree
customer_reviews.author: Sone

customer_reviews.title: Feels horrible, tears easily when you're trying to open and ...
customer_reviews.text: Feels horrible, tears easily when you're trying to open and put it on your face. Don't waste your time or money.
customer_reviews.author: ERMELINDA  PEREZ

customer_reviews.title: I don't like the feeling of it on my skin
customer_reviews.text: I don't like the feeling of it on my skin. I felt stinging on my face which was really uncomfortable
customer_reviews.author: Annieee

customer_reviews.title: It was cool and refreshing at a bargain price
customer_reviews.text: The mask is thin with lots of serum. It was cool and refreshing at a bargain price. Very nice mask.
customer_reviews.author: lilypie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the tightness along with the soft skin. My skin looks bight too
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Carter

customer_reviews.title: BEST facial mask I've ever tried
customer_reviews.text: BEST facial mask I've ever tried! I have sensitive skin and this product leaves NO feeling of burning which many other products do... I also do not like products with heavy fragrance (makes me wonder how much unnecessary chemicals would've had to be added for the fragrance...). This product has a pleasant scent but isn't too heavy. super gentle but DOES ITS JOB! my skin feels super smooth and hydrated. LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: No skin reaction
customer_reviews.text: I've tried other products from this company and had mixed results due to skin reactions to some of the products. It's the curse of sensitive skin I guess. I have not had any skin reactions from this brightening pearl mask. The mask is easy to apply and very relaxing. It leaves your skin feeling soft and smooth. I purchased this product at a discount with the intention to leave my honest and unbiased review and I would be willing to purchase this product at full price.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: it was so much that i felt like i was getting shower on my face
customer_reviews.text: The masks has a lot of extract. it was so much that i felt like i was getting shower on my face, which is good. I felt burning sensation when I put them on which went away 5 min later. The next day, my face looked very bright and moisturized. Happy with pearl and can't wait to try bird's nest and snail.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Kim

customer_reviews.title: love these
customer_reviews.text: I love these masks. They're heavily saturated so I really do just lie down for 15-20 minutes while wearing one, which, as a stay-at-home mom, is actually a nice break :) And when I take the mask off, my face is still really saturated with moisturizer so that I spend a few minutes massaging it into my skin. Afterwards, there's a little stickiness--so I wouldn't recommend doing these anytime other than at night an hour or two before bed. BUT the next morning, my skin looks so good--I swear, there's an extra glow--and the stickiness is gone. The benefits are visibly noticeable for days, and my skin feels great for even longer than that.
customer_reviews.author: SMcClung

customer_reviews.title: Amazing face masks
customer_reviews.text: Amazing face masks! I am completely amazed with these facial masks. I am a huge fan of all things beauty and I love all things beauty. I believe that there is no such thing as too many of something. I really love facial masks and I love this one too. It's great it's not to watery, it's not to thick, it's just perfect. It goes on smooth and it doesn't irritate my skin. I enjoyed testing out this product. This is a product that I'd gladly purchase again. I am a satisfied happy customer. I was given the opportunity to purchase this product at a discounted price in exchange for my unbiased review.
customer_reviews.author: Nreimonenq

product_meta.title: MOTHER MADE Brightening Pure Pearl Face Sheet Mask Pack of 10 with Hyaluronic Acid, Vitamin C, Peptides for Skin Whitening, Moisturizing, Anti-aging, Paraben-free, Cruelty-free
